album.title: Sinatra Reprise: The Very Good Years

name: Night and Day
comments: There is no better singer, the Frank.  There will never be another, never tire of his music.  ALWAYS THE BEST
I personally like the old feel of this recording.

Love:  The 1957 Capitol recording.
Dislike:  All others.
My favorite version by the Chairman of the Board.
que bonita!!!!!!!!!!! se me van los pies............
one of the best singers ever
Oh, thank you, Mr. Cole and Mr. Blue Eyes, for this.
So romantic.  I would love to dance to this.
Love this song.  Wish they had let Ella Fitzgerald record it.
A natural phenom..that is Frank Sinatra !

yes, this is sinatra, 100%. 

this is his 50s version for capitol records, which people may be confusing with the version he did in the 60s for reprise, which sounds a lot different.
